column2: The new ruling government has been loosening restrictions on the presence of religion in governance. At first, judges appointed to the courts began ruling more traditionally on morality, and budgets began to include more spending on religious institutions. With the latest law signed, the state sponsorship of missionaries and religious establishments, it could be said that the old secular system of government has at last come to an end.
We have regained part of our national fabric

From the first day of rule, it was obvious that the new $COUNTRY_ADJ$ government had a different attitude towards religion than the old government apparatus. It began with the attitudes of judges appointed to the courts and cuts in spending to religion institutions. With the latest instructions, the prevention of outward preference toward any religion in state institutions, it is clear that religion is no longer part of government.

The Red Guards are communists who have risen in open rebellion against the government, and, more importantly, against all of what they consider to be the reactionary trappings of the bourgeois state, and even society. In opposition to the institutions of religion, tradition, private ownership and family, these revolutionaries seek instead to establish a 'Dictatorship of The Proletariat', the first step on the long, corpse-strewn way to the promised classless utopia of Communism.
column3: Les Gardes Rouges sont des communistes qui sont entrés en rebellion ouverte contre le gouvernement,et, plus important encore, contre tout ce qu'ils considèrent être des attributs réactionnaires de l'Etat bourgeois, jusqu'à être contre la société. En opposition aux institutions religieuses, à la tradition, à la propriété privée et à la famille, ces révolutionnaires cherchent à établir une "dictature du prolétariat", premier pas sur le long chemin jonché de corps menant vers l'utopie sans classes du communisme.
column4: Die Roten Garden sind Kommunisten, die in offener Rebellion gegen die Regierung angehen und, noch wichtiger, gegen alles, das sie als reaktionäres Machwerk des bourgeoisen Staats und selbst der Gesellschaft ansehen. In Opposition gegen die Institutionen der Religionen, Traditionen, privaten Eigentums und Familie streben diese Revolutionäre statt dessen eine 'Diktatur des Proletariats' an, den ersten Schritt auf dem langen, leichengepflasterten Weg zur verheißenen Utopie des Kommunismus.
column6: Los Guardias Rojos son comunistas que se han alzado en rebelión abierta contra el gobierno y, lo que es más importante, contra todo aquello que consideran los cimientos reaccionarios del estado burgués, incluida la sociedad misma. Frente a las instituciones de la religión, la tradición, la propiedad privada y la familia, estos revolucionarios aspiran a establecer una 'Dictadura del proletariado', primer paso del camino largo y sembrado de cadáveres que conduce a la utopía sin clases del Comunismo.

column2: This region is considered a stronghold of communist support within the country.
Communists want to enact social reforms, but want to see political reforms rolled back.
column3: Les communistes veulent davantage de réformes sociales et le retrait des réformes politiques.
column4: Kommunisten sind an zusätzlichen Sozialreformen interessiert, setzen sich aber für die Außerkraftsetzung von Politikreformen ein.
column6: Los comunistas quieren promulgar reformas sociales, pero rechazan las reformas políticas.

column2: This region is considered a stronghold of conservative support within the country.
Conservatives prefer the status-quo, but may back reforms under conditions of high militancy.
column3: Les conservateurs préfèrent le statu quo, mais peuvent soutenir les réformes en cas d'extrême nécessité.
column4: Konservative bevorzugen den Status Quo, können aber in extremen Situationen Reformen unterstützen.
column6: Los conservadores prefieren el statu quo, pero pueden apoyar reformas en condiciones de elevada militancia.

column2: Jihadists are militant traditionalists who have risen up in rebellion against the, real or perceived, oppressive practices of the government and the state apparatus, seeking to protect their cultural liberty whatever the cost. Fighting against the sectarian state, these revolutionaries consider themselves Gods-fighters in the true sense of the word.

Jihadists are militant traditionalists who have risen up in rebellion against the, real or perceived, oppressive practices of the government and the state apparatus, seeking to protect their cultural liberty whatever the cost. Fighting against the sectarian state, these revolutionaries consider themselves Gods-fighters in the true sense of the word.
This region is considered a stronghold of traditionalist support within the country.
Traditionalists wants to introduce the law of God as the law of the land, they will support reforms depending on public opinion.

Liberal Rebels strive for the inclusion of broader stratas of the population in the government of the nation. In an absolute monarchy they will rise to impose a constitutional monarchy, whereas they in all other cases seek to establish a democracy.
column3: Les rebelles Jacobins libéraux luttent pour inclure des classes plus larges de la population dans le gouvernement de la nation. En présence d'une monarchie absolue, ils se dresseront pour imposer une monarchie constitutionnelle, s'ils ne cherchent pas à établir une démocratie.
column4: Liberale jakobinische Rebellen streben danach, größere Teile unserer Bevölkerung in die Regierung unseres Landes zu integrieren. In einer absoluten Monarchie werden sie sich zur Erzwingung einer konstitutionellen Monarchie erheben. In anderen Situationen werden sie sich für die Errichtung einer Demokratie einsetzen.
column6: Los rebeldes jacobinos liberales pugnan por la inclusión de estratos más amplios de la población en el gobierno de la nación. En una monarquía absoluta, se alzarán para imponer una monarquía constitucional, mientras que en cualquier otro caso buscarán establecer una democracia.

column2: This region is considered a stronghold of liberal support within the country.
Liberals want to enact further political reforms, but will also support social reform under conditions of high militancy.
column3: Les libéraux veulent davantage de réformes politiques.
column4: Liberale sind an zusätzlichen Politikreformen interessiert.
column6: Los liberales abogan por más reformas políticas, pero apoyarán también reformas sociales bajo condiciones de elevada militancia.

column2: Nationalist rebels seek freedom for $COUNTRY_ADJ$. They are well led and equipped, and they will focus on achieving independence for their nation.
column3: Les rebelles nationalistes veulent la liberté pour leur peuple. Bien menés et bien équipés, ils vont tout mettre en œuvre pour obtenir l'indépendance de leur nation.
column4: Nationalistische Rebellen kämpfen für die Freiheit ihres Volkes. Gut diszipliniert und ausgerüstet konzentrieren sich auf die Erlangung der Unabhängigkeit für ihr Land.
column6: Los rebeldes nacionalistas buscan la libertad de su pueblo. Están bien dirigidos y equipados, y se afanarán en lograr la independencia de su nación.

column2: This region is considered a stronghold of nationalist support within the country.
Nationalists protect the rights of the primary culture, they will support reforms depending on public opinion.

The Citizen Guard are militant populists who have risen up in rebellion against the, real or perceived, oppressive practices of the government and the state apparatus, seeking to protect their cultural liberty whatever the cost. Fighting against the sectarian state, these revolutionaries consider themselves freedom-fighters in the true sense of the word.
This region is considered a stronghold of populist support within the country.
Populists represent the common people against a political elite, they will roll back political reforms.
Party loyalty towards §YProgressive and Green parties§!
This region is considered a stronghold of progressive and green support within the country.
Progressive has a green progressive vision of the future, they will support political both social and political reforms.
In a democracy, militant conservatives will seek to enforce a socialist government. In any other country, they will seek to establish a democracy with a socialist government.
This region is considered a stronghold of socialist support within the country.
Socialists want to see the enactment of further social reforms, but may back political reforms under conditions of high militancy.
column3: Les socialistes veulent davantage de réformes sociales.
column4: Sozialisten sind an zusätzlichen Sozialreformen interessiert.
column6: Los socialistas abogan por promulgar más reformas sociales, pero pueden apoyar reformas políticas en condiciones de elevada militancia.

column2: This region is considered a stronghold of coneservative support within the country.
Moderates will do whatever needs to be done to keep the country stable.
